subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Mercyhurst, which plays in the semifinals of the Division I women’s Frozen Four on Friday, is trying to become the first team from outside the W.C.H.A. to win the title since its inception in 2001.
snippet: Mercyhurst, which plays in the semifinals of the Division I women’s Frozen Four on Friday, is trying to become the first team from outside the W.C.H.A. to win the title since its inception in 2001.
